AdditionalConfiguration.description: The schema for this 'additional configuration' field. Must provide inline schema xor the file that contains the schema

aioConnectorMetadataVersion.description: The version of AIO connector metadata schema that this connector metadata file adheres to.

description.description: A brief (human-readable) description of the connector.

maintainer.description: A name and/or email of the maintainer of this connector.

vendor.description: A name and/or email of the vendor that distributes this connector.

repository.description: The container registry and docker image name for the connector. For example: contoso-acr.io/MyConnector

tag.description: The tag of the docker image for this connector

digest.description: The digest of the docker image for this connector

repository.description: The container registry and helm chart name for the connector. For example: contoso-acr.io/helm/MyConnector

tag.description: The tag of the helm chart for this connector

digest.description: The digest of the helm chart for this connector

minimumKubernetesVersion.description: Minimum required version of kubernetes needed to run this connector

architecture.description: The architecture that this connector should run on

sourceCode.description: Details about the source code that compiled this connector

language.description: The programming language used to write this connector

languageVersion.description: The version of the programming language used to write this connector

sdk.description: Details about the versions of the AIO SDKs used to write this connector (if they were used)

mqttPackageVersion.description: The version of the azure iot operations MQTT package

servicesPackageVersion.description: The version of the azure iot operations services package

connectorPackageVersion.description: The version of the azure iot operations connector package

resourceRequirements.description: The minimal resource requirements to run this connector

aioConfig.description: The AIO requirements to run this connector

minVersion.description: The minimal (inclusive) version that can run this connector.

maxVersion.description: The maximal (inclusive) version that can run this connector.

protocols.description: The array of protocols that this connector operates over.

configSchemas.description: The JSON schemas for the various 'additional configuration' fields. A JSON schema must be provided for each 'additional configuration' only if that field is used by this connector.
